ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Glorify then the name of your Lord, the Magnificent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So glorify the name of your Lord Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), glorify the name of your Lord, the Great One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), proclaim the purity of your Lord, the Greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore-glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So glorify the name of thy Tremendous Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Almighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So celebrate the Name of your Lord, the All-supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So glorify the name of thy Lord Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Magnificent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:52] So glorify, exalt as transcendent, the Name (bi’smi: the bā’ [bi-] is extra) of your Lord, the Tremendous: glory be to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So glorify the name of thy Tremendous Lord) so pray by the command of your Tremendous Lord; it is also said this means: mention the divine Oneness of your Tremendous Lord Who is more tremendous than all things'. And of the surah in which the Ascending Stairways are mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 44 verses, 216 words and 861 letters: Surah 70: The Ascending Stairways [al-Ma'arij) And of the surah in which the Ascending Stairways are mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 44 verses, 216 words and 861 letters:
